actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to create a select committee to conduct an investigation and study of denials of basic human rights in Southeast Asia by Communist forces.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Establishes a select committee within the House of Representatives to study executions, abductions, and other denials of basic human rights in Southeast Asia by Communist forces and to report its findings during the Ninety-fifth Congress.

titles.title: Resolution to create a select committee to conduct an investigation and study of denials of basic human rights in Southeast Asia by Communist forces.
